TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BinaryKeyIdentifierClause
Public NotInheritable Class EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause Inherits BinaryKeyIdentifierClause

summary.span: 表示識別已加密金鑰的金鑰識別碼子句。

span.span: Represents a key identifier clause that identifies an encrypted key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了在建立自訂安全性權杖服務時，通常並不需要使用 。Typically, the does not need to be used, other than when a custom security token service is created. 當安全性權杖服務傳回安全性權杖時，所發出的安全性權杖會包含已附加及未附加之安全性權杖的參考。When a security token service returns a security token, the issued security token contains references to attached and unattached security tokens. 附加的參考會參考包含在 SOAP 訊息之安全性標頭中的安全性權杖，而未附加的參考是指不包含在 SOAP 訊息之安全性標頭中的安全性權杖。Attached references refer to security tokens that are contained within the security header of a SOAP message and unattached references are security tokens that are not included within the security header of a SOAP message. 這些參考通常會證明這些發出之安全性權杖的真實性。These references typically affirm the authenticity of the issued security token. 使用 類別，參考已加密的金鑰。Use the class to reference an encrypted key. 方法會傳回已加密的金鑰。The method returns the encrypted key. [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 會接受 Wire 格式正確的包裝的金鑰。 accepts wrapped keys that are well formed with respect to the wire format. Wire 上指定的金鑰包裝演算法會被接受並採用。The key wrap algorithm specified on the wire is accepted and used. 尚未確認與端點指定的 是否相容。It is not verified to be compatible with the specified by the endpoint.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified key that is encrypted, the cryptographic algorithm used to encrypt the key, a key identifier for the key and a user-readable name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當指定 `derivationNonce` 和 `derivationLength` 參數時，就會使用權杖的隱含衍生金鑰 (而不使用權杖的直接安全性金鑰)。When the `derivationNonce` and `derivationLength` parameters are specified the implied derived key is used instead of the direct security key of the token. 在 中使用靜態常數字串，指定 `encryptionMethod` 參數的密碼編譯演算法。Use the static constant strings in the to specify the cryptographic algorithm for the `encryptionMethod` parameter.

span.span: is .
-or-
is .
is zero length.

MemberSignature.Value: public string CarriedKeyName { get; }
.property instance string CarriedKeyName
Public ReadOnly Property CarriedKeyName As String
public: property System::String ^ CarriedKeyName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得與已加密金鑰有關聯的使用者可讀名稱。

span.span: Gets a user-readable name that is associated with the encrypted key.

value.span: 與已加密金鑰有關聯的使用者可讀名稱。

span.span: A user-readable name that is associated with the encrypted key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性序列化為 XML，它會放置於 <`CarriedKeyName`> 項目。When the property is serialized into XML, it is placed in the <`CarriedKeyName`> element. 加密金鑰，如 <`CarriedKeyName`> 項目是選擇性項目關聯的索引鍵值的使用者可讀名稱。For encrypted keys, the <`CarriedKeyName`> element is an optional element that associates a user-readable name with a key value. 這個名稱可以再用來參考索引鍵使用 <`KeyName`> 內的項目 <`KeyInfo`> 項目。This name can then be used to reference the key using the <`KeyName`> element within the <`KeyInfo`> element. 相同 <`CarriedKeyName`> 元素的值，不同於為識別碼的值，可以發生多次單一文件中。The same <`CarriedKeyName`> element value, unlike an ID value, can occur multiple times within a single document. 索引鍵的值必須是相同的所有 <`EncryptedKey`> 具有相同識別的項目 <`CarriedKeyName`> 在 XML 文件中的名稱。The value of the key must be the same in all <`EncryptedKey`> elements identified with the same <`CarriedKeyName`> name within an XML document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳回的陣列是已加密金鑰的複製 (Clone)。The array that is returned by the method is a clone of the encrypted key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳回的字串，其中會包含已加密的金鑰，以及用來加密金鑰的密碼編譯演算法。The method returns a string that contains the encrypted key and the cryptographic algorithm that is used to encrypt the key.
